questions.question: How many and which @@@ products can I buy?
answer: The cashback promotion applies to the purchase of one @@@ product from the following variants:
The promotion applies exclusively to products purchased in Poland.

questions.question: What will I get a refund for?
answer: If you have met all the promotion conditions and your participation is valid, you will receive a refund of the full purchase price of the promotional @@@ product (less any discounts) via bank transfer to the specified account.

questions.question: Who can participate in the promotion?
answer: Only adults aged 18 and over residing in Poland can participate in the promotion.

Employees of @@@, as well as individuals directly involved in its development or implementation, including representatives of advertising agencies, consultants, service providers, and members of their families and households, are excluded from participation.
Additionally, the purchase of promotional products through online retailers does not qualify for participation in the promotion.
